faqs.q: How can you help my business?
faqs.a: MangAI offers AI automation and solutions for businesses: automation and workflows, personal brand and growth systems, custom applications and micro-SaaS, and consulting and advisory. We work with real estate, beauty, marketing agencies, and service businesses.

faqs.q: What AI services do you offer?
faqs.a: We offer: automation and workflows (CRM, leads, social media, back-office), personal brand and growth systems (AI-assisted content creation, branding), custom applications and micro-SaaS, and consulting and advisory (AI roadmaps, audits, education).

faqs.a: For marketing agencies we offer AI for faster drafts, campaigns, and content; lead gen and follow-up automation; and custom systems for your clients (chatbots, bookings). White-label solutions for your clients are also possible.

AI tools are software applications that use artificial intelligence to perform tasks that would otherwise require human work â€” e.g. answering inquiries, preparing documents, or sales support. For small businesses in Croatia and the region that means tools that can work in local language and fit limited resources.

faqs.q: Are AI tools expensive for small businesses?
faqs.a: Many off-the-shelf tools offer free tiers or packages of a few tens of euros per month. For 2â€“3 tools in a small firm a realistic range is around â‚¬50â€“200 per month. Cost depends on scope and number of users.

faqs.q: Do I need a developer for AI automation?
faqs.a: For simple off-the-shelf tools (e.g. text generation, template chatbots) usually not. For automation and integrations with your systems it's often better to hire a consultant or partner with experience â€” you save time and reduce setup errors.

It depends on complexity: one clear use case (e.g. answering common inquiries) can be live in a few weeks. Custom solutions or multiple processes take longer â€” typically from a few weeks to a few months.

faqs.q: Is AI safe for business data?
faqs.a: It's important to use tools that keep data in the EU and comply with GDPR. For business and personal data check provider terms and prefer solutions with a clear privacy policy and data processing agreement option.

AI business automation means using software with artificial intelligence to perform repetitive business tasks â€” from answering inquiries to admin and lead tracking â€” with less manual work and human control over decisions.

For real estate we recommend: an AI chatbot on your website for first contact and qualification (buy/rent, location, budget), scheduling viewings, and handing leads to your sales team. Results in weeks.

For beauty and services: appointment booking, client reminders, and answers to questions about prices and services â€” reduces missed calls and empty slots. Ideal for smaller salons without full-time reception.
For marketing agencies: AI for faster drafts and campaigns, lead gen and follow-up automation, and custom chatbots or booking systems for your clients. White-label options available.

For other industries: the first step is to identify where you have the most repeated inquiries or manual work. Often a web chatbot plus CRM automation delivers the fastest results. A free analysis tells you exactly where to start.

For website inquiries, a chatbot on your site that answers common questions, triages inquiries, and hands complex cases to humans is ideal. We can connect it to your CRM and email â€” 24/7 responses without extra hours.
For social media we can automate first response (DM or comments), qualification, and routing to booking or a form. Reduces delays and manual work.
For email: AI can classify inquiries, generate reply drafts, and update your CRM. Complex cases are handed to a human with context. Saves hours per week.

When you have inquiries everywhere, the biggest impact usually comes from one unified system: one chatbot or agent that receives all channels and triages â€” web, social, email. Then handoff to humans with context.
For lead gen agencies: AI for lead qualification, automated follow-up, and handing hot leads to clients. You can deliver more leads with less manual work.
For performance agencies: campaign automation, faster creative drafts, and analytics. AI helps you scale without proportionally growing the team.
For full-service: a combination â€” AI for content and campaigns, chatbots for clients, and internal automation. We can tailor packages for each client.
For teams of 1â€“5: focus on one or two use cases â€” e.g. answering inquiries or bookings. AI saves hours without hiring. Quick implementation in weeks.
For teams of 6â€“20: it makes sense to automate more channels â€” web, email, maybe social. One unified system (chatbot + CRM) delivers the most value.
For 20+ employees: you can roll out AI across more processes â€” support, sales, marketing, admin. We recommend a phased approach with clear KPIs.
